org.hisp.dhis.commons.util

Class Clock

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.commons.lang3.time.StopWatch
      • org.hisp.dhis.commons.util.Clock

  • public class Clock
extends org.apache.commons.lang3.time.StopWatch
    Utility class providing stopwatch-like functionality.
    Author:
    Lars Helge Overland

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Clock()
      Create a new instance.
      Clock(org.apache.commons.logging.Log log)
      Create a new instance with a given logger.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Clock logTime(String message)
      Timestamps the given message using the elapsed time of this Clock and logs it using the logger.
      Clock startClock()
      Start the clock.
      String time()
      Yields the elapsed time since the Clock was started as an HMS String.
